explanation: Sentiment is mixed to cautious with several participants warning of a big drop or bearish fractals. Some technical analysis references suggest possible further downside (triangle rejection, head and shoulders, 'bear fractal'), and mentions of targets below the current price (105,350). However, there is also talk of strong support and possible bounce, so confidence is not high.
